The Bethel Experience

World-class academics. Career-focused experience. Life-changing faith.

Study what you love

Work alongside nationally recognized faculty who will empower you to leverage your strengths and lead with confidence.

Practice what you learn

Think critically about your convictions so that you can remain rooted in your beliefs while rising to meet the worldâ€™s challenges.

Move beyond competence and arrive at confidence.

Some of the best learning comes from doing. Thatâ€™s why we weave hundreds of hands-on experiences into our programsâ€”like collaborative research, internships, study abroad, and service learning, to name a few.

Whether youâ€™re a computer science student designing a corporate website or an aspiring nurse participating in end-of-life simulations, youâ€™ll take your learning beyond the classroom so that youâ€™re prepared to be as impressive in practice as you are on paper.

Live what you believe

Every calling begins with a single truth.

Beyond academics, there's something that draws Bethel students together. It's a sense of calling, a commitment to shared values, and a deep desire to fulfill a greater purpose.

Youâ€™ll be challenged to think critically about your convictions and consider some of lifeâ€™s most difficult questions from a Christian perspective. And when you take your place in our increasingly diverse world, youâ€™ll know what it means to own your faith and live for something more.

Chapel

Here, attending Chapel is a choice. Three times a week, youâ€™ll have the opportunity to learn from campus pastors and renowned speakers.

SHIFT

Our Shift ministry will invest in your spiritual development and help you build community on your freshman floor while you transition to college life.

Vespers

Our Sunday evening Vespers services, led entirely by student vocalists and instrumentalists who are passionate about ministering through music.
